results.title: Effect of amlodipine on ventricular hypertrophy in hypertension patients: a systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: This study evaluated the effect of a calcium channel blocker, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, on @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LV hypertrophy@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

results.title: Wild type transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis in a young individual
results.text_hl: The electrocardiogram of the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ suggested @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LVH@@@) with strain pattern and sinus rhythm (Fig. 1A).

results.title: Physical performance is preserved after regression of left ventricular hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: It is concluded that long-term blood pressure control with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@ or both is associated with significant reductions in left ventricular mass and improved diastolic function in elderly @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Lacourcière Y, Poirier L, Cléroux J. Physical performance is preserved after regression of left ventricular hypertrophy. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1997 Sep;30(3):383-91. PMID: 9300324

results.title: Amlodipine: effective for treatment of mild to moderate essential hypertension and left ventricular hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@: effective for treatment of mild to moderate @DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Islim IF, Watson RD, Ihenacho HN, Ebanks M, Singh SP. Amlodipine: effective for treatment of mild to moderate essential hypertension and left ventricular hypertrophy. Cardiology. 2001;96 Suppl 1():10-8. PMID: 11574741

results.title: Effect of amlodipine on left ventricular mass in the Amlodipine Cardiovascular Community Trial.
results.text_hl: ...As part of the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ Cardiovascular Community Trial (ACCT), which was a large multicenter study designed to assess the effects of the @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ channel blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine besylate@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Norvasc@@@) as monotherapy for treatment of mild to moderate @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, we sought to determine the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on regression of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular (LV) hypertrophy@@@ (LVH).

citations.NLM: Kloner RA, Sowers JR, DiBona GF, Gaffney M, Wein M. Effect of amlodipine on left ventricular mass in the Amlodipine Cardiovascular Community Trial. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1995 Sep;26(3):471-6. PMID: 8583790
citations.BibTeX: @article{8583790, title={Effect of amlodipine on left ventricular mass in the Amlodipine Cardiovascular Community Trial.}, author={Kloner RA and Sowers JR and DiBona GF and Gaffney M and Wein M}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={26}, number={3}, pages={471-6}}

results.title: Drug safety evaluation of amlodipine.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@, besides being effective on @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@, appears beneficial in slowing down the progression of @DISEASE_Hypertrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@carotid hypertrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@, and can be used in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina pectoris@@@, even if the first choice for @DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@ treatment is beta-blockers.

citations.NLM: Derosa G, Maffioli P. Drug safety evaluation of amlodipine. Expert Opin Drug Saf. 2011 Sep;10(5):795-804. PMID: 21591999
citations.BibTeX: @article{21591999, title={Drug safety evaluation of amlodipine.}, author={Derosa G and Maffioli P}, journal={Expert Opin Drug Saf}, volume={10}, number={5}, pages={795-804}}
